name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS JBB Drop 10 Baseball Bat is a powerhouse of performance and comfort, designed for young athletes aiming for excellence. Certified with the USSSA 1.15 BPF, this bat features a balanced swing feel, thanks to its one-piece alloy construction and 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter. The striking black, sky blue, and red colorway is just the beginning, as the bat boasts a ring-free barrel construction that enhances barrel flex and overall production. With the AZR Alloy ensuring optimal performance and the AV3 Vibration Dampener minimizing vibrations, players will enjoy a comfortable and responsive experience. Additionally, the multi-variable wall design expands the sweet spot, while the TFX End Cap and custom knob design provide increased forgiveness and a tailored feel, complemented by an enhanced soft touch grip for superior control. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: Free & Fast Shipping on all orders
Warranty: Full twelve (12) months through the manufacturer
Ring-Free Barrel Construction: Enhances barrel flex & overall bat production
AZR Alloy: Ensures optimal plate performance & bat responsiveness
AV3 Vibration Dampener: Absorbs vibrations & sting for feel & comfort
Multi-Variable Wall Design: Expanded sweet spot w/ forgiving barrel walls
TFX End Cap: Softer end cap increases forgiveness
Custom Knob Design: Optimized knob shape for each drop for better feel
Enhanced Soft Touch Grip: Enhances feel & control
